Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LCD HGTV
Reviews.Author: kyakr
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model Samsung when it first came out about 3 years ago.  This is a great television.  The HD picture is extremely life-like and high quality - I would definitely recommend it and when I purchase another HD TV it will most likely be another Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Multiple colored lines
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv (LN460C610) three years ago (May 2010). Started from about a month ago, the whole screen is covered by colored vertical thin lines. I contacted the samsung, they said the problem can be fixed but since the product is out of warrenty, I have to pay by myself.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung LN46C610 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Auto Motion Plus and Touch of Color Design
